dmca.title: NetResult DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:
 
This letter is to notify you, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), see 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512 et seq., that your website is infringing copyrighted materials owned by the NASCAR Media Group, LLC (â€œNMGâ€).

Specifically, NMG owns the exclusive worldwide right to license for commercial and promotional purposes all intellectual property of NMG, NASCAR and its member teams, including, but not limited to, all moving images and other audio/video content featuring NASCAR race action (collectively, "NASCAR Content").  The NASCAR Content displayed and/or disseminated on the http://h1sp0rts.blogspot.co.uk/p/stream-2.html is being displayed and/or disseminated without the permission or authorization of the NMG.
 
Accordingly, NMG requests that you act expeditiously to disable access to the unauthorized videos being displayed and/or disseminated on the web pages listed below and remove its contents from view. 

	http://h1sp0rts.blogspot.co.uk/p/stream-2.html
  
I hereby state that the NMG is the owner of the exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to act on NMGâ€™s  behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of the NMG I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorized by NMG , its agents, or the law.

I, [redacted], as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. 

If you have any questions, please contact the undersigned at the contact information provided below.

Yours sincerely,
 
[redacted] 
 
NetResult Solutions Limited
[redacted]
London
SW15 9DT
United Kingdom

Tel: +44 (0)20 8246 4133
